Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison, and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison, and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Chicago
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Chicago due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Chicago due to police activity

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
